tests.output:
> language-detection-tests@1.0.0 test:before
> jest --runInBand --config=jest.before.config.js


PASS before tests/languageDetection.test.ts
  Language Detection Utility - Requirements Validation
    Requirement 1: Empty and whitespace-only inputs
      √ should return reason "empty" for empty string (10 ms)
      √ should return reason "empty" for whitespace-only input (spaces) (7 ms)
      √ should return reason "empty" for whitespace-only input (tabs) (2 ms)
      √ should return reason "empty" for whitespace-only input (newlines) (3 ms)
      √ should return reason "empty" for mixed whitespace (2 ms)
    Requirement 2: Non-Latin characters must return "non_latin" before other classifications
      √ should return "non_latin" for single Arabic word (not "too_short") (2 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Chinese characters (1 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Cyrillic text (1 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Japanese Hiragana (2 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Japanese Katakana (1 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Korean Hangul (12 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Devanagari (Hindi) (1 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Bengali script (3 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Tamil script (2 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Telugu script (1 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for Malayalam script (1 ms)
      √ should return "non_latin" for mixed Latin and non-Latin text (4 ms)
    Requirement 3: Texts with fewer than 5 words must return "too_short"
      √ should return "too_short" for 4 words with normal spacing (2 ms)
      √ should return "too_short" for 4 words with multiple consecutive spaces (2 ms)
      √ should return "too_short" for 3 words (1 ms)
      √ should return "too_short" for 2 words (1 ms)
      √ should return "too_short" for 1 word (3 ms)
      √ should handle leading/trailing spaces correctly when counting words (2 ms)
      √ should NOT return "too_short" for exactly 5 words (11 ms)
      √ should NOT return "too_short" for more than 5 words (5 ms)
    Requirement 4: Pure English text must return isEnglish: true with reason "valid"
      √ should return isEnglish: true and reason: "valid" for "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" (2 ms)
      √ should return isEnglish: true for simple English sentence (2 ms)
      √ should return isEnglish: true for longer English text (3 ms)
      √ should return isEnglish: true for English with punctuation (2 ms)
      √ should return isEnglish: true for English with numbers (1 ms)
    Requirement 5: Results must be deterministic
      √ should return identical results for same input called 3 times - English text (4 ms)
      √ should return identical results for same input called 3 times - short text (2 ms)
      √ should return identical results for same input called 3 times - non-Latin text (6 ms)
      √ should return identical results for same input called 3 times - whitespace (1 ms)
      √ should not be affected by previous calls with different inputs (14 ms)
    Requirement 6: detectLanguage must return null (not undefined) for empty/undetermined inputs
      √ should return null for empty string
      √ should return null for whitespace-only input (2 ms)
      √ should return null for tabs
      √ should return null for newlines (1 ms)
      √ should return null when franc returns "und" (undetermined) (3 ms)
    Requirement 7: Unicode ranges must be correctly bounded
      √ should match Arabic character at end of range (U+06FF) (1 ms)
      √ should match CJK character at end of range (U+9FFF)
      √ should match Hangul character at end of range (U+D7AF) (1 ms)
      √ should match various Arabic characters in range (1 ms)
      √ should match various CJK characters in range (1 ms)
      √ should match various Hangul characters in range (1 ms)
      √ should NOT match Latin characters (1 ms)
    Requirement 8: COMMON_NON_ENGLISH_WORDS must not contain English words
      √ should NOT falsely flag pure English text as non-English (8 ms)
      √ should correctly identify Spanish text with non-English words (2 ms)
      √ should correctly identify Vietnamese text with non-English words (4 ms)
    Requirement 9: No breaking changes to function signatures
      √ checkLanguage should accept string and return LanguageCheckResult (3 ms)
      √ isEnglish should accept string and return boolean
      √ detectLanguage should accept string and return string or null (1 ms)
    Requirement 10: Must handle any string input without throwing exceptions
      √ should handle empty string without throwing (2 ms)
      √ should handle extremely long strings without throwing (10 ms)
      √ should handle special characters without throwing (1 ms)
      √ should handle Unicode characters without throwing (2 ms)
      √ should handle mixed content without throwing (2 ms)
      √ should handle newlines and tabs without throwing (2 ms)
    Requirement 12: All validation scenarios must pass
      √ Scenario 1: "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" → isEnglish: true, reason: "valid" (1 ms)
      √ Scenario 2: "   " (whitespace only) → isEnglish: false, reason: "empty" (1 ms)
      √ Scenario 3: "one  two   three    four" (4 words with extra spaces) → reason: "too_short"
      √ Scenario 4: "مرحبا" (single Arabic word) → reason: "non_latin" (not "too_short")
      √ Scenario 5: Same input called 3 times must return identical results (1 ms)
      √ Scenario 6: detectLanguage("   ") → null (not undefined) (1 ms)
    Edge Cases and Additional Validation
      √ should handle text with only numbers (1 ms)
      √ should handle text with only punctuation (1 ms)
      √ should handle single character (1 ms)
      √ should handle exactly 5 words correctly (1 ms)
      √ should handle text with leading and trailing whitespace (2 ms)
      √ should handle mixed case text (1 ms)

Test Suites: 1 passed, 1 total
Tests:       71 passed, 71 total
Snapshots:   0 total
Time:        5.862 s, estimated 6 s
Ran all test suites.
